title: I would like to swap Icons:D
body: Hello, i was wondering if i could swap my Curse season 3 icon for a TSM season 3 icon. They are worth the same amount of RP, they are in the same season, same year , same look. I don't see a problem with it but would i be able to?...Thanks

replies.body: You *might* be, though it'll be more or less how the robot is feeling at the time you ask. Make a support ticket and tell them of your claim.
